title: Dry Shampoo Products Recalled Over Possible Benzene Presence
description: More than a dozen aerosol dry shampoo products from brands like Dove and Suave may have elevated levels of benzene, a carcinogen, the company said.
dc:creator: Christine Chung
media:description: An internal investigation at Unilever United States found that some spray cans of dry shampoo might contain elevated levels of benzene.
